metadataAttributes.Title: Best Practices in Planning DE&I Interventions
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Best practices in Planning DE&I Interventions presents a “how-to,” step-by-step approach to planning around and executing diversity initiatives. From recruitment, retention, and training, this module addresses issues such as what do you do when your organization is not ready for DE&I, to how to turn principle concepts of DE&I into practical application and desired deliverables.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Richard Anthony Baker, J.D., M.P.A, Ph.D.
